sentences.sContent: The choice will be influenced by selection of business partners in the value chain, emerging standards and pragmatics of a solution.
sentences.sContent_eng: The choice will be influenced by selection of business partners in the value chain, emerging standards and pragmatics of a solution.
sentences.sCn: 这种选择将会受到价值链中业务合作伙伴的选取、出现的标准和解决方案的语用学的影响。

sentences.sContent: I graduated from Shanghai Foreign Languages University in 1988, majoring in English literature and linguistics. I got my Master’s degree in pragmatics in 1998.
sentences.sContent_eng: I graduated from Shanghai Foreign Languages University in 1988, majoring in English literature and linguistics. I got my Master’s degree in pragmatics in 1998.
sentences.sCn: 我1988年毕业于上海外国语大学，主修英语文学与语言学，并于1998年获得了语用学硕士学位。

phrases.pCn: 实际的方法；重实效的方法

trans.tranOther: the study of how words and phrases are used with special meanings in particular situations
